events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the software engineering department to proceed with further evaluation.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application process and guide you through the next steps.
Your initial screening interview was completed successfully. We are impressed with your background and would like to move forward.
Thank you for your prompt response and flexibility in scheduling the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for next Wednesday at 2 PM UTC. We look forward to discussing your skills in detail.
The technical interview round was completed successfully. Your coding skills and problem-solving approach met our expectations.
We have arranged an HR interview for you on May 10th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
